text: Gu khaŋ suan za mbui thi? Moses suaŋgi tɨvi, nta Fhe Bakɨme fhum suaŋgi bunin pana gumgi thi? Zakɨra fhuvara! Maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme nza nɨɨŋgi tɨva thueŋ zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn nzan ndɨɨ kake, nza maaŋ muuŋgip Moses suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vuim, Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir nzan kae.
